QueryDefinition.Query: select distinct cast(left(cast(o.patid as varchar), 7) || cast(o.obsid as varchar) as bigint) as visitDetailId, o.patid, o.staffid, o.pracid, o.obsdate, coalesce(c.consdate, o.obsdate) as date, case when p.probenddate is null then o.obsdate else p.probenddate end as end_date, o.numrangehigh, o.numrangelow, o.value, n.description, cast(left(cast(o.patid as varchar), 7) || cast(o.parentobsid as varchar) as bigint) as parentVisitDetailId, case when m.cleansedreadcode is null then m.snomedctconceptid else m.cleansedreadcode end as key, case when m.cleansedreadcode is null then concat(concat(cast(m.snomedctconceptid as varchar),'-'),m.term) else concat(concat(m.cleansedreadcode,'-'),m.term) end as source_value from {sc}.observation o join {sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND o.patid = ch.PERSON_ID left join {sc}.consultation c on o.patid = c.patid and o.consid = c.consid left join {sc}.problem p on o.patid = p.patid and o.obsid = p.obsid left join {sc}.lookup_numunit n on o.numunitid = n.numunitid left join {sc}.lookup_emismedicaldictionary m on o.medcodeid = m.medcodeid where o.obsdate is not null order by o.patid
